scripts.build: tsc -p tsconfig.json && node -e "const fs=require('fs');const p='dist/format-configs.js';const data=fs.readFileSync(p,'utf8');if(!data.startsWith('#!')) fs.writeFileSync(p,'#!/usr/bin/env node\\n'+data);fs.chmodSync(p,0o755);"
scripts.format: npx --yes prettier --config configs/.prettierrc.json --ignore-path configs/.prettierignore --write . && npx --yes markdownlint --config configs/.markdownlint.json --ignore-path configs/.markdownlintignore "**/*.md"
